arStrings.szText: Picking up {c_important}{u}Crackling Energy{/u}{/c} grants you {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|x%|]{/c} increased damage for {c_number}{SF_1}{/c} seconds, up to {c_number}[{SF_0} * {SF_2} * 100|%x|]{/c}.
Dealing {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} increased damage per stack from picking up {c_important}{u}Crackling Energy{/u}{/c}.
